fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a full moon, prepare to place a transitory Strike. Transitory Strikes are the same as regular Strikes, but disappear after one night.
- Once per game, choose instead to prepare 5 transitory Strikes.
- Control a Striked player and learn their role.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Learn which players are Striked at the start of each night.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain basic defense.
- You do not have access to the factional Thundercry chat.
